revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot
revision.text: {{ITN talk|2 November|2013}} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Biography|living=no|class=start|military-priority=low|military-work-group=y|listas=Mehsud, Hakimullah}} {{WikiProject Pakistan|class=start|importance=Mid}} {{WikiProject Islam|class=start|importance=Mid}} {{WikiProject Criminal|class=start}} {{WikiProject Terrorism|class=start|importance=Mid}} {{WikiProject Military history|class=start|B1=n|B2=n|B3=y|B4=y|B5=y|Biography=yes|Middle-Eastern=yes}} }} == Dead? == Pakistani intelligence reported him dead today, but the Taliban denies this. I've added the claim to the article. If anyone gets more up to date news please edit them in.--[[User:Zulu, King Of The Dwarf People|Zulu, King Of The Dwarf People]] ([[User talk:Zulu, King Of The Dwarf People|talk]]) 23:01, 15 January 2012 (UTC) :I get the feeling this is going to be disputed, he is dead on two other wikipedias ..[http://vi.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hakimullah_Mehsud here], Pakistani urdu? I think, and [http://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%83%8F%E3%82%AD%E3%83%BC%E3%83%A0%E3%83%83%E3%83%A9%E3%83%BC%E3%83%BB%E3%83%9E%E3%83%95%E3%82%B9%E3%83%BC%E3%83%89 here] China? please comment.[[User:Off2riorob|Off2riorob]] ([[User talk:Off2riorob|talk]]) 15:31, 22 July 2010 (UTC) ::Vietnamese (vi) and Japanese (ja). Looking at the article, I ''suspect'' they just haven't been updated as recently, but it's possible it's a deliberate editorial choice - do we know how reliable the sources "suggesting" he's still alive are? [[User:Shimgray|Shimgray]] | [[User talk:Shimgray|talk]] | 12:21, 3 August 2010 (UTC) :::He is now dead as the [[Taliban]] confirms... leave it alone. [[User:Kennvido|Kennvido]] ([[User talk:Kennvido|talk]]) 18:29, 1 November 2013 (UTC) ::Via BBC, [http://www.bbc.com/news/world-asia-24464506 Obituary: Hakimullah Mehsud] [[User:FeralOink|FeralOink]] ([[User talk:FeralOink|talk]]) 12:27, 28 October 2014 (UTC) == Order of sections (Death, Reward for capture)? == Would it make more sense for the "Death" section to be after the "Reward for Capture" section? [[User:Sxg169|Sxg169]] ([[User talk:Sxg169|talk]]) 12:56, 3 November 2013 (UTC) :{{done}} [[User:Tomásdearg92|Tomásdearg92]] ([[User talk:Tomásdearg92|talk]]) 21:05, 3 November 2013 (UTC) == Why isnt it noted he was in peace talks with Pakistan? == To hide that a peace envoy was targetted by Obama's drones? — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/78.180.44.118|78.180.44.118]] ([[User talk:78.180.44.118|talk]]) 18:30, 4 November 2013 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just added archive links to {{plural:1|one external link|1 external links}} on [[Hakimullah Mehsud]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=702060910 my edit]. If necessary, add {{tlx|cbignore}} after the link to keep me from modifying it. Alternatively, you can add {{tlx|nobots|deny{{=}}InternetArchiveBot}} to keep me off the page altogether. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/20100212084023/http://www.npr.org:80/templates/story/story.php?storyId=123558839 to http://www.npr.org/templates/story/story.php?storyId=123558839&ft=1&f=1004 When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' to let others know. {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 05:16, 28 January 2016 (UTC) == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:6|one external link|6 external links}} on [[Hakimullah Mehsud]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=716215848 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive http://web.archive.org/web/20131103193533/http://www.allvoices.com/news/1904884-pakistan-hakimullah to http://www.allvoices.com/news/1904884-pakistan-hakimullah *Added archive http://web.archive.org/web/20120116051810/http://online.wsj.com/article/SB10001424052970204555904577162311210518958.html to http://online.wsj.com/article/SB10001424052970204555904577162311210518958.html *Added archive http://web.archive.org/web/20100117073133/http://www.dawn.com:80/wps/wcm/connect/dawn-content-library/dawn/news/pakistan/03-hakeemullah-mehsud-cultivates-ruthless-reputation-ss-07 to http://www.dawn.com/wps/wcm/connect/dawn-content-library/dawn/news/pakistan/03-hakeemullah-mehsud-cultivates-ruthless-reputation-ss-07 *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20121004035654/http://www.dawn.com/wps/wcm/connect/dawn-content-library/dawn/news/pakistan/19-suspected-drone-strikes-in-shaktoai-south-waziristan-casualties-feared-hh-05 to http://www.dawn.com/wps/wcm/connect/dawn-content-library/dawn/news/pakistan/19-suspected-drone-strikes-in-shaktoai-south-waziristan-casualties-feared-hh-05 *Added archive http://web.archive.org/web/20091105014926/http://www.dawn.com:80/wps/wcm/connect/dawn-content-library/dawn/news/pakistan/07-government-offers-reward-for-leads-on-taliban-chiefs-ha-04 to http://www.dawn.com/wps/wcm/connect/dawn-content-library/dawn/news/pakistan/07-government-offers-reward-for-leads-on-taliban-chiefs-ha-04 *Added archive http://web.archive.org/web/20150330062703/http://www.khyber.org/images/maps/waziristan.gif to http://www.khyber.org/images/maps/waziristan.gif When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:Cyberbot II|cyberbot II]][[User talk:Cyberbot II|Talk to my owner]]:Online 16:02, 20 April 2016 (UTC)
